name: Instints
description:
You're a player that survived the apocaliptic virus, but you have to eliminate all the zombies in order to restore the world(Feature might be implemented later). For that you will have a torch and a set of weapons, 

But don't be confident, as time passes you're flashlight will diminiush, you'll have to find more batteries that have a little glow around them, Plus you'll have to find ammo, and don't waste them,they are scarce.

Ultimately you'll have to find a bunker and in that bunker kill the Boss in order to win.
